title: iDaiyarAdun
sahitya:
iDaiyarAdun malaraDi bhajikkum an-nALE inba nAL manamE


anupallavi

  neDu nAL tazhaittu vaLarndu eTTi pazhuttenna Odi paruttenna payan


caraNam    mUvAshaip-pEi piDittu marai shollum murai tavari vilangu pOl alaindAi
nAvAra shiva shiva enrayyan nAmam uraikkavum nANuginrAi
pUvAzhvO shatam enRu pozhudellAm pAzhAik-kazhindadu pOdAdO
dEvAdi dEvan ammaiyum appanum Ana shivapirAn tanjamena nambi
